meanings.definition: A person who shares a bed with another.
meanings.sent1: My sister is my bedmate when we have sleepovers.
meanings.sent2: I always feel safe and cozy with my bedmate beside me.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks she's my bedmate, but she takes up too much space!
meanings.sent4: The warm blanket was the perfect bedmate on the cold night.
meanings.sent5: Having a loyal bedmate can make bedtime more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: A companion or partner in bed.
meanings.sent1: My teddy bear is my favorite bedmate to cuddle with at night.
meanings.sent2: She was thrilled to have her best friend as her bedmate during the sleepover.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy pillow became my unexpected bedmate after I kicked off the blanket.
meanings.sent4: The soft music played by the radio was the perfect bedmate for a peaceful night's sleep.
meanings.sent5: A good book can be a wonderful bedmate for those who love to read before sleeping.
